column4: so documentation says that libasound2-plugins should be in universe, but I don't see it.
what, the qemu or the xen?
with qemu, do you install the os viturally and run it like you would with vmware?
i just want to be able to run FC 5 on top of ubuntu without having to restart
how do i download to use vserver
when i do a apt-cache search vserver, there is nothing called vserver, there is kernel-patch-vserver, util-vserver and vserver-debiantools
how does one install and run a os from vserver?
now i have to figure out how to install and run FC 5 from vserver
but doesn't that involve having FC 5 already installed in the system?
